sections.description:
â¤ï¸â€ It is a Currency Converter & Exchange Rates Widgets, easy-to-use, with beautiful UI. Included rates of 86 world banks (sources).

ğŸ“Œ About

Simple and powerful real-time Currency Converter and Exchange Rates widgets for your website/blog or e-commerce. Included exchange rates data, from 86 (sources) central banks of the world.

DEMOğŸ‘€

Video demonstration of the settings and capabilities of the plugin.

ğŸ“© Feel free, write if you will have any questions: online support
â­ï¸ Please, don’t forget to RATE the plugin. ğŸ™ This will influence future development.

ğŸª„ FEATURES ğŸª„

â˜‘ï¸ 200+ Currencies and Popular CryptoCurrencies;
â˜‘ï¸ Currency exchange rate data from 86 central banks of the world;
â˜‘ï¸ Including: black markets, dollar blue etc., sources;
â˜‘ï¸ Updates automatically (per hour by WordPress Cron);
â˜‘ï¸ Flexible design and settings, easy to adapt to your style;
â˜‘ï¸ Types of currency icons: rectangular, square, circler;
â˜‘ï¸ Real-time conversion;
â˜‘ï¸ Easy-to-use;
â˜‘ï¸ Free forever;
â˜‘ï¸ UpTime 99.99%;
â˜‘ï¸ Our plugin will complement your site and keep your users engaged.

ğŸ“Œ Widgets

  • Currency Converter is easy to use, simple real-time converter;
    âœ” Universal widget, it can be used on travel and property website/blog, as well as online stores.
  • Currency Table is a table with exchange rates and another features.
    âœ” The currency rates table is mainly used by news websites, portals and financial forums.

ğŸ“Œ Shortcode

  • Badge is a simple exchange rates list.
    âœ” An excellent shortcode that can be used in international online stores. With ease you can add a list of prices in different currencies to the product page.

ğŸ’± Data sources ğŸ’±

ğŸ“Œ Installation

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit “Plugins > Add New”
  2. Search for “Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets”
  3. Activate Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets from your Plugins page.
  4. Add widgets on yourdomain.com/wp-admin/widgets.php page.

ğŸ“Œ From WordPress.org

  1. Download Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets.
  2. Upload the “Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets” directory to your “/wp-content/plugins/” directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…).
  3. Activate Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets from your Plugins page.
  4. Add widgets on yourdomain.com/wp-admin/widgets.php page.

ğŸ“Œ From WordPress “Add Plugins”

  1. Download Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets.
  2. Go to yourdomain.com/wp-admin/plugin-install.php
  3. Press button “Upload Plugin”
  4. Choise “Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets” zip archive and press button “Install Now”.
  5. Add widgets on yourdomain.com/wp-admin/widgets.php page.

ğŸ“Œ Installation

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit “Plugins > Add New”
  2. Search for “Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets”
  3. Activate Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets from your Plugins page.
  4. Add widgets on yourdomain.com/wp-admin/widgets.php page.

ğŸ“Œ From WordPress.org

  1. Download Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets.
  2. Upload the “Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets” directory to your “/wp-content/plugins/” directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…).
  3. Activate Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets from your Plugins page.
  4. Add widgets on yourdomain.com/wp-admin/widgets.php page.

ğŸ“Œ From WordPress “Add Plugins”

  1. Download Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets.
  2. Go to yourdomain.com/wp-admin/plugin-install.php
  3. Press button “Upload Plugin”
  4. Choise “Exchange Rates & Currency Converter – Widgets” zip archive and press button “Install Now”.
  5. Add widgets on yourdomain.com/wp-admin/widgets.php page.
